item.title: PyDGN: a Python Library for Flexible and Reproducible Research on Deep Learning for Graphs
item.description: We investigate the quality of quantitative measures that assess the utility of a graph structure for node classification tasks.

item.title: Towards Learning Trustworthily, Automatically, and with Guarantees on Graphs: an Overview
item.description: An overview of the current works focused towards learning trustworthily, automatically, and with guarantees on graphs.

item.title: Catastrophic Forgetting in Deep Graph Networks: A Graph Classification Benchmark
item.description: We study the phenomenon of catastrophic forgetting in the graph representation learning scenario.

item.title: A deep graph network-enhanced sampling approach to efficiently explore the space of reduced representations of proteins
item.description: Learning complex measure of information loss in reduce representations of proteins via deep graph networks.

item.title: Probabilistic Learning on Graphs via Contextual Architectures
item.description: Further studies on the Contextual Graph Markov Model.

item.title: A Gentle Introduction to Deep Learning for Graphs
item.description: A top-down approach to the field of machine learning for graphs.
